title: Spring 2014 Shoe Sale: Buy More, Save More! | Lord & Taylor
description:
You might not have seen the Lord & Taylor commercial for the Spring 2014 Shoe Sale, so we wanted to make sure you know about it.

Don't miss Lord & Taylor's biggest shoe sale of the season. Buy More, Save More. Let's Go Shopping! http://ow.ly/uXU1N
